channel.title: The Daily Matchmass
channel.description: Daily briefing covering Lakers basketball, surf conditions, and California news
channel.itunes:author: Ben

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-27
item.description: Dive into a massive day for tech as OpenAI secures a historic $110 billion funding round while Anthropic takes a principled stand against the Pentagon over AI safety. This episode also breaks down the Lakers’ latest heartbreaker and the strategic addition of Tony Bennett to their front office, alongside major shifts in Hollywood ownership and the rise of "AI-native" corporate restructuring. Finally, stay informed with local updates on school budget proposals and the weekend surf outlook for the Central Coast.

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-26
item.description: This episode explores the reported chemistry crisis between Lakers superstars LeBron James and Luka Doncic alongside a seismic shift in Anthropic’s approach to AI safety. We also break down the breaking news of an FBI raid on the Los Angeles Schools Chief and provide an update on the glassy, foggy surf conditions greeting the coast today.

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-25
item.description: Experience the highs and lows of the sports and tech worlds, from the Lakers' heartbreaking buzzer-beater loss to the rapid integration of AI agents as official team members in the workplace. This episode also dives into major policy moves regarding international data privacy and the latest creative updates from Adobe and Amazon.

item.title: The Daily Matchmass — 2026-02-24
item.description: Dive into a high-stakes standoff between the Pentagon and Anthropic over AI safety guardrails and the latest $500 million investment in the race for chip dominance. This episode also explores the rise of workplace AI agents, regulatory battles facing tech giants, and a key preview of tonight’s Lakers matchup against the Orlando Magic.
